Package com.arjuna.OrbCommon

Interface Summary
ORBFilter Some ORBs support the notion of interceptors (or filters) which we can use to do threading, implicit context propagation, and interposition.
 

Class Summary
Configuration Module specific configuration object.
Info Module specific implementation of the interface object.
OAAttribute Classes to be called before or after the OA is initialised.
OAInterface An attempt at some ORB portable ways of interacting with the OA.
OAPostShutdown Objects to be called after the OA has shutdown should implement this class.
OAPreShutdown Instances of classes derived from this interface can be registered with the system and do any tidy-up necessary after the ORB has been shutdown.
OAShutdown Common methods for OA shutdown.
ORBAttribute Classes to be called before or after the ORB is initialised.
ORBEnvironment Various property variables which can be set to achieve different effects.
ORBExceptions Some exception values we may set.
ORBFilterManager The filter manager is responsible for managing object and process-level filters.
ORBInterface An attempt at some ORB portable ways of interacting with the ORB.
ORBObject An attempt at some ORB portable ways of binding to objects and registering objects with the name service, configuration file, etc.
ORBPostShutdown Objects which should be invoked after the ORB has shutdown should be derived from this class.
ORBPreShutdown  
ORBServices An attempt at some ORB portable ways of accessing ORB services.
ORBShutdown Some common methods for the ORB shutdown classes.
